original_text: I say about King Cyrus, “He is my shepherd. 44: Leaders are often called shepherds, because they take care of people, like a shepherd takes care of his sheep. He will do what I want him to do.” He will give a command about Jerusalem. He will say, “Build the city again!” He will say about the temple, “Build its foundation.” ’ I say about King Cyrus, “He is my shepherd. 44: Leaders are often called shepherds, because they take care of people, like a shepherd takes care of his sheep. He will do what I want him to do.” He will give a command about Jerusalem. He will say, “Build the city again!” He will say about the temple, “Build its foundation.” ’ I say about King Cyrus,
korean_text: 고레스에 대하여는 이르기를 내 목자라 그가 나의 모든 기쁨을 성취하리라 하며 예루살렘에 대하여는 이르기를 중건되리라 하며 성전에 대하여는 네 기초가 놓여지리라 하는 자니라

sentences.original_text: because they take care of people
like a shepherd takes care of his sheep
sentences.korean_translation: 마치 목자가 자기 양을 돌보는 것처럼

sentences.original_text: He will do what I want him to do
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 내가 원하는 것을 할 것이다

sentences.original_text: He will give a command about Jerusalem
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 예루살렘에 대한 명령을 내릴 것이다

sentences.original_text: He will say about the temple
